mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrmFeeEvent Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FEE_EVENT_SN , FEE_EVENT_TP_CD , FEE_EVENT_NM , EVENT_BEG_DT , EVENT_END_DT , ADIT_FEE_RT , USE_YN , EVENT_APL_TGT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM_FEE_EVENT WHERE 1 = 1 AND FEE_EVENT_SN = #{feeEventSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deletePrmFeeEvent Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM PRM_FEE_EVENT WHERE 1 = 1 AND FEE_EVENT_SN = #{feeEventSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
